attributes.action: Ensure that all right hand drive vehicles using British roads are required to be fitted with converters to adjust their headlamps to dip correctly for British roads in the same way that UK drivers are forced to do when travelling abroad.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Traditionally when travelling abroad we are conditioned to sticking bits of plastic onto our headlamps so that our lights which have a raised section to the left will not dazzle oncoming traffic. Alternatively the motoring associations tell us we will be hauled off to jail.  However how many of the foreign vehicles on our roads have these? Nil in my experience. If it matters abroad it matters here.
